content.rendered:
Dr Matieni is the Founder of Online Education as Community of Enquiry (OECE) consultancy Group.

Before joining Regent Group, he worked as Curriculum Manager for Ford motor Company Ltd.’s apprenticeship scheme liaising with Open University (Graduate Programmes) and Dr Matieni has more than 15 years’ experience teaching in High Education.

Research interests and publications

Quality and Business Improvement, Computer Networking, IT infrastructure, AI & Machine Learning, Digital Marketing & e-commerce, and Process control and Modelling.
